name: vyomtech-erp
description: VyomTech ERP - Multi-tenant AI-powered ERP System

scripts.prisma:migrate: cd prisma && npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.prisma:seed: cd prisma && npx prisma db seed
scripts.prisma:reset: cd prisma && npx prisma migrate reset --force
scripts.prisma:push: cd prisma && npx prisma db push
scripts.setup: npm install && npm run prisma:generate && npm run prisma:migrate && npm run prisma:seed
